model.playlistmanager.choicestrategy

Class ShuffleStrategy<X>

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.playlistmanager.choicestrategy.ShuffleStrategy<X>
  • Type Parameters:
    X - The type of the playlist elements
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlaylistChoiceStrategy<X>

    public class ShuffleStrategy<X>
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlaylistChoiceStrategy<X>
    This strategy rappresent the mode for chosing song randomly from a playlist This strategy remember some extracted song, so the instances give the capability to return to a extract previous song
    Author:
    Matteo Gabellini, Alessandro Cevoli
